source: if i put myself in their shoes
definitions: To imagine oneself in another person's situation or circumstances, especially to understand their perspective, feelings, or actions.
examples: If I put myself in their shoes, I can see why they made that difficult decision.
It's easier to empathize if I put myself in their shoes and consider their struggles.
I try to understand their motivations; if I put myself in their shoes, it makes more sense.
